sources.title: Lucky To Me
sources.description: Work colleagues Potty and Minnie marry in secret. Then on the wedding night they are sent to give financial advice to a wealthy client who also has romantic problems.

metadata.Plot: Work colleagues Potty and Minnie (Stanley Lupino and Barbara Blair) marry in secret. Then on the wedding night they are sent to give financial advice to a wealthy client who also has romantic problems.
metadata.Writer: Clifford Grey, Stanley Lupino, Arthur Rigby
metadata.Actors: Stanley Lupino, Phyllis Brooks, Barbara Blair
